cookieConsent.notice.message: You can revoke cookies at anytime at the bottom of the page.

cookieConsent.subtitle.message: We use cookies on our website. They help us get to know you a little and how you use our website. This helps us provide a more valuable and tailored experience for you and others.

cookieConsent.title.message: We would like to use cookies

errors.unknown.message: Something went wrong. Please try submitting the form again

misc.embargoMessage.description: Embargo means that the story is not allowed to be shared before the specified date

misc.toggleMobileNavigation.description: A tooltip for a button that toggles the mobile menu on the web page

noStories.subtitle.message: Come back later to see new stories.

notFound.subtitle.message: If you typed the URL yourself, check the spelling in the address bar.

notFound.title.message: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist...

search.action.description: The word should be treated as a verb (e.g. a Search action on a button)

search.noResults.message: Nothing found! Please try another search term!

search.title.description: The word should be treated as a noun (e.g. a title of the Search section)

serverError.subtitle.message: Try refreshing the page or coming back a bit later.

subscription.disclaimer.description: The variables are replaced with text from `actions.subscribe` and `subscription.privacyPolicy` messages along with a link to the privacy policy.
subscription.disclaimer.message: By clicking "{subscribe}" I confirm I have read and agree to the {privacyPolicyLink}.
